title: Cedaero Bar Hopper V2 Pack
content:
Cedaero’s Bar Hopper handlebar pack is now a little bit better, these simple bags keep your burritos, small electronics, an extra layer, and whatever else within close reach on the front of your bike’s handlebars…

A new attachment system allows this pack to be used on a wider range of handlebars configurations and diameters. The original integrated straps have been replaced by a 1″ webbing daisy chain and two (included) 9″ Voile Nano straps. This new system is simpler and allows the pack to fit on a huge range of handlebar setups and avoid interference with lights, mounts, and other attachments. On the back side is the same daisy chain with Velcro One-Wrap strap as before, providing a secure and universal link to either stem or steerer.

Specs:

  • 1000D Cordura Nylon, 15oz waxed canvas, or RX30 X-pac exterior
  • 200D Nylon lining
  • Dimensions: 9.5″ width x 5.5″ diameter
  • Two 9″ Voile Nano straps included
  • D-ring shoulder strap attachments
  • Velcro One-Wrap strap stem/steerer strap
  • Daisy chain on front for various accoutrements
  • #9 Ideal zipper with Nanosphere DWR coating
  • Interior mesh pocket and key hook
  • 100% Made in USA

See more at Cedaero.
